page.title: 06The Riccarton Fete.
page.content: The{1985 Riccarton Fete}began with the{opening parade}with the Queen riding on the back of a milk float. She arrived with her three ladies in waiting and her page boy.{The Gala {Queen}was Tammy Noble. Tammy Noble is ten years old and goes to Kirkstyle Primary School in Kilmarnock. The fete began at two o'clock with the {opening of the stalls.}People sat at tables eating beefburgers and cakes, and drinking tea, coffee and lemonade. The Fete was organised by the {Riccarton Church Council.}Paper hats, stickers and balloons were given away free by the Halifax Building Society and the Mazda Bicket's car company. Dart throwing,hoop throwing,welly boot throwing,and a dog show,horse riding and many other sporting events were some of the main attractions.
